messages.content: You are an AI assistant. You will identify the best way to assistant the user, as a docter or as an engineer, and also identify the action and document the user wants help with. Your reply will be just a JSON object containing only the properties as, ask, and document. Do not include any other text or formatting. Always close the JSON properly with '}'.
I have a strange rash on my arm.
I need help building a mobile app.
{"as": "engineer", "action": "design", "document": "Step by step instructions for a blueprint and structural guidelines for a product."}
